channel.title: Thumbs up [30 CUSTOMS!]New Prophecyscape Client & Server[NEW MINIQUEST!]
channel.description:
Thumbs up [30 CUSTOMS!!!]New Prophecyscape Client & Server[NEW MINIQUEST!!!] First of all, please realize that my source is based off of Aintaro's latest Dragon History Source. But, it is definitely way off from what it originally was. I've done a whole lot to it to make it my own. This is not a leech at all. I give credits to Aintaro for his source, but the rest is all me.
The newest version of my source has a lot of cool new stuff to it. I have added at least 30 Customs to the client.
Here are all the customs: Name Item ID Metallica T-Shirt 13672 Foam Finger 12012 Energy Sword 11338 Shadow Sword 13900 Legendary Sword of Prophecyscape 10137 //Creds to me AlexDGr8r Moderator Cape 13677 Administrator Cape 13678 Owner Cape 13679 Owner Cape 13964 Admin Cape 13965 Moderator Cape 13966 Indiana Jones Hat 9005 Elysian Spirit Shield 9003 Faylin Godsword 2.0 17004 Dragon Kiteshield 16006 Monkey Bag 9004 Walking Target Board 9010 Stunners a.k.a Sunglasses 15219 Fargen's Sword 12001 //Creds to me AlexDGr8r Sniper Gun 17609 Berek Godsword 14492 Supreme Claws 14516 Bass Guitar 16023 Uber Sword 12026 God Dagger 11331 Halo Helmet 11328 Cigarette 13663 Tri-Godsword 11333 AlexDGr8r's Sword 10114 //make this into your owner sword //Creds to me AlexDGr8r Another Barek Godsword 14492
Majority of customs come from the pvserver custom pack v3. I can't remember who made the pack but creds go to him for compiling all the customs into one pack.
Here are some of the features in my source: 1. Staffzones with Staff shops and also has working staff capes. 2. New Home: Ardougne 3. Customs Shop 4. Miniquest/Dungeon called "Legend of Prophecyscape". Rename to your server. 5. Owner Weapons that are uber powerful. To reassure that owners have all the power. LOL!!! XD 6. Newly redone Mega Tormented Demon. (Used as final boss for Legend of Prophecyscape) 7. Portal Station that is used for players to teleport to various places. 8. A new GFrame. 9. Working minigames like castle wars, etc. 10. Mithril Dragon area. 11. Aintaro's features in his source. 12. Owner Zones with thrones. Please realize that my name, as an owner, is on the back of the throne along with my co-owner's thrones as well. Remove if you must and add your own throne. 13. Much much more...
Before I tell you the download link, here are some screenshots: [img]http://i34.tinypic.com/2s7jguq.jpg[/img] [img]http://i33.tinypic.com/smv8ep.jpg[/img] [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/30w8lyx.jpg[/img] [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/t510g9.jpg[/img] [img]http://i33.tinypic.com/2jtaps.jpg[/img] [img]http://i37.tinypic.com/1sfxwl.jpg[/img] [img]http://i37.tinypic.com/2u5vtb8.jpg[/img] [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/2gw8coy.jpg[/img] This is just some of what my source has to offer! There is much more if you dig in and explore. I hope you like, but if you don't, that's fine too.
Here's the download links:
Client Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?zzycymzytkh
Also coming with client is the original GFrame if you want it to be back to Classic. Also included is Tom's Cache Suite so you can edit GFrame.
Source Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?dzygnyljyfz
Before you ask, you change the IP in client.java. Not in EGUI.java.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2009, 01:34:22 pm[/size][hr]plz comment to keep this post alive and if u want plz rep if u not stopp flaming my i remove this and if i got 15 reps i rep you guys wxho repped my thats it have fun and if sum1 got a pvp planet source that the runs work plz pm me i wanna code it

item.title: Thumbs up [30 CUSTOMS!]New Prophecyscape Client & Server[NEW MINIQUEST!]
item.dc:creator: @s_k_e_l_l_y s k e l l y
item.description:
@s_k_e_l_l_y wrote:

[quote=“joris-rocks, post:1, topic:319582”]Thumbs up [30 CUSTOMS!!!]New Prophecyscape Client & Server[NEW MINIQUEST!!!]
First of all, please realize that my source is based off of Aintaro’s latest Dragon History Source. But, it is definitely way off from what it originally was. I’ve done a whole lot to it to make it my own. This is not a leech at all. I give credits to Aintaro for his source, but the rest is all me.

The newest version of my source has a lot of cool new stuff to it. I have added at least 30 Customs to the client.

Here are all the customs:
Name Item ID
Metallica T-Shirt 13672
Foam Finger 12012
Energy Sword 11338
Shadow Sword 13900
Legendary Sword of Prophecyscape 10137 //Creds to me AlexDGr8r
Moderator Cape 13677
Administrator Cape 13678
Owner Cape 13679
Owner Cape 13964
Admin Cape 13965
Moderator Cape 13966
Indiana Jones Hat 9005
Elysian Spirit Shield 9003
Faylin Godsword 2.0 17004
Dragon Kiteshield 16006
Monkey Bag 9004
Walking Target Board 9010
Stunners a.k.a Sunglasses 15219
Fargen’s Sword 12001 //Creds to me AlexDGr8r
Sniper Gun 17609
Berek Godsword 14492
Supreme Claws 14516
Bass Guitar 16023
Uber Sword 12026
God Dagger 11331
Halo Helmet 11328
Cigarette 13663
Tri-Godsword 11333
AlexDGr8r’s Sword 10114 //make this into your owner sword //Creds to me AlexDGr8r
Another Barek Godsword 14492

Majority of customs come from the pvserver custom pack v3. I can’t remember who made the pack but creds go to him for compiling all the customs into one pack.

Here are some of the features in my source:

  1. Staffzones with Staff shops and also has working staff capes.
  2. New Home: Ardougne
  3. Customs Shop
  4. Miniquest/Dungeon called “Legend of Prophecyscape”. Rename to your server.
  5. Owner Weapons that are uber powerful. To reassure that owners have all the power. LOL!!! XD
  6. Newly redone Mega Tormented Demon. (Used as final boss for Legend of Prophecyscape)
  7. Portal Station that is used for players to teleport to various places.
  8. A new GFrame.
  9. Working minigames like castle wars, etc.
  10. Mithril Dragon area.
  11. Aintaro’s features in his source.
  12. Owner Zones with thrones. Please realize that my name, as an owner, is on the back of the throne along with my co-owner’s thrones as well. Remove if you must and add your own throne.
  13. Much much more…

Before I tell you the download link, here are some screenshots:

smv8ep.jpg773×531

30w8lyx.jpg773×531

t510g9.jpg773×531

2jtaps.jpg773×531


2u5vtb8.jpg773×531

2gw8coy.jpg773×531

This is just some of what my source has to offer! There is much more if you dig in and explore. I hope you like, but if you don’t, that’s fine too.

Here’s the download links:

Client Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?zzycymzytkh

Also coming with client is the original GFrame if you want it to be back to Classic. Also included is Tom’s Cache Suite so you can edit GFrame.

Source Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?dzygnyljyfz

Before you ask, you change the IP in client.java. Not in EGUI.java.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2009, 01:34:22 pm[/size][hr]plz comment to keep this post alive and if u want plz rep
if u not stopp flaming my i remove this and if i got 15 reps i rep you guys wxho repped my thats it have fun
and if sum1 got a pvp planet source that the runs work plz pm me i wanna code it[/quote]

suck this server sucks " how old are you? " are you 8 years old? wow this is horrible sucks first your client sucks and 2nd 30s customs sucks man :mad:

Read full topic

@david7147 wrote:

2/10 for trying
thumbs down Keep trying though, we’re not flaming only saying what you need to approve on(or at least I am)
Good try though

Read full topic
item.source: Thumbs up [30 CUSTOMS!]New Prophecyscape Client & Server[NEW MINIQUEST!]

item.title: Thumbs up [30 CUSTOMS!]New Prophecyscape Client & Server[NEW MINIQUEST!]
item.dc:creator: @AlexDGr8r AlexDGr8r
item.description:
@AlexDGr8r wrote:

OK, WTF??? I originally posted this on locus. This was my absolute failure client. I had to completely get a new client (and server). I’m glad you guys agree that this was terrible. I was a newb coder back then and hardly knew what I was doing. I went back and re-did everything. Now my server is laggless, has good models, and a much much much much much better gframe. I now have a gframe with a style that I custom made instead of leeched off another person. That’s right, the gframe in this client was leeched off of another person. This was an EPIC FAIL!!! Thank you for your criticism. It made me go back and rethink what I was doing. Now my client has a screenshot taker, mp3 player, links to my site, and even a good login box.

I would appreciate if a mod locked this and/or deleted it. This must have been posted by one of my players without my permission. I’m done hosting my own server now, but I’m still coding. I’m now going to help people on here. Once again, thanx for the criticism. Without that criticism, I never would have becomed the programmer I am now.

Read full topic
item.source: Thumbs up [30 CUSTOMS!]New Prophecyscape Client & Server[NEW MINIQUEST!]
